title: Alarm Clock Pro 14.0.1 – Multi-featured alarm clock system
content: Alarm Clock Pro isn’t just an ordinary alarm clock. Use it to wake you up in the morning, send and compose e-mails, remind you of appointments, randomize the iTunes selection, control an internet radio station, and even time your baking!   Wake up to the serenity of your musical selection. title: CollageIt Pro 3.6.9 – Easy-to-use collage maker
content: CollageIt 3 for Mac is an easy-to-use and automatic app that helps create eye-catching photo collages on Mac OS X. title: MacTotalSecurity 9.6 – Secure from Virus, Malware
content: Max Total Security is designed to provide complete protection for your Mac.   Max Total Security secures the device against viruses and malware, and even provides Device Locator in case of theft and Safe Browsing protection. Now with real-time protection on the most active directories. Our Mac Anti-Malware engine is OPSWAT Bronze Certified.   Customizable […]

title: FontXChange 5.6 – Convert fonts to OpenType, PostScript or TrueType
content: FontXChange can easily convert fonts to OpenType (PS), PostScript Type 1, and TrueType for both Mac or Windows.   Useful features include: Batch processing for converting entire font libraries; Preferences to set font encodings; Font inspection window with preview; Support for many font encodings, including Adobe Standard, Unicode, Mac Roman, and Windows ANSI, and European. title: Antivirus by MaxSecure 9.4 – Virus and spyware protection
content: AntiVirus (was Max Secure Antivirus) is designed to protect against viruses, spyware, and all other types of malware. Now also scans for the WireLurker malware and provides best protection against zero-day threats and attacks. title: LilyView 1.5.1 – Multi-touch image viewer [FIX]
content: LilyView is a lightweight, mutli-touch-friendly image viewer that’s handy and doesn’t get in your way. Lightweight. There’s no image library to load, you just browse images in a folder. Chromeless. No controls are visible until they are really necessary. Multi-touch friendly. You can literally touch the image when using a trackpad, but LilyView works just […]

title: Switch 1.2.1 – Manage Your Shell Commands

title: Tuxera NTFS 2021 – NTFS driver developed from the open source NTFS-3G driver
content: Tuxera NTFS for Mac is a commercial NTFS driver developed from the popular open source NTFS-3G driver, which is a natural part of all major Linux distributions, and also has lots of users on Mac OS X, FreeBSD, Solaris and NetBSD.   It has been engineered to bring our customers maximum possible performance when accessing […]

title: Neural Mix Pro 1.1.1 – Extract instrumentals & vocals [FIX]
content: Welcome to Neural Mix Pro, the AI-powered music player & editor for producers, DJs, and musicians.
